statements: DELETE FROM Files WHERE keywords @> ARRAY['important'] AND file_size > 10000
DELETE FROM file_search_files WHERE file_id = 100 AND file_name = 'example_file';
DELETE FROM file_search_keywords WHERE keyword_name = 'database' AND keyword_id = 50;

DELETE FROM file_tags WHERE file_id IN (SELECT file_id FROM files WHERE file_name LIKE '%document%');
